subtitleNullable: Listed Indian General Election 2024 Incidents concerned to voting, polling booth
descriptionNullable:
**IMPORTANT NOTE: UNDERSTAND GIVEN DATA**

We used Google Search "News" section and using Tools, filtered the News from 12-04-2024 to 05-06-2024, as the Indian General Election happened from 19-04-2024 to 01-06-2024. This dataset is completely dependent on reported incidents and listed in Google News. One incident (one column in the dataset) can refer to many other incidents. So, do not use this data to measure the efficiency of ECI or a particular state's law and order. 

We can use this dataset, by visiting sources provided in the dataset, when the Election Commission of India has taken action and when have not, and also by understanding the difference between alleged and evident incidents.
